title: Mixed Veggie Fried Noodle
directions: * cook your instant noodle and strain from the water, mix the basic seasoning (powder only) to your preferred salty level
* toss in your veggies and stir around until half cooked
* optional - add in some butter for fragrance
* toss around till veggies are cooked, toss in the noodle
* crack the egg on an empty space on the pan, beat it on the pan with your spoon / spatula, let half cook
* stir half cooked egg and mix with noodle and veggie bits
* toss around until egg is cooked
ingredients: * instant noodle (i'm using chicken maggi mee)
* veggies - check your fridge (i'm using carrots, broccoli, capsicum and white button mushrooms, all diced)
* diced onions and garlic to your liking
